pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, June 16, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, June 16, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the O-Train Belfast Yard Maintenance and Storage Facility and will make an announcement.

O-Train Belfast Yard Maintenance and Storage Facility
805 Belfast Road
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for portion of visit
  • Open coverage for announcement
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Belgium, Charles Michel.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Prime Minister of Belgium, Charles Michel.

Foyer
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
